contentrichtext.text: {{MedalTableTopPic|Evgenia Medvedeva Andrey Kondrashov Ivan Isaev Russian Ski Magazine.JPG|200px|Medvedeva (left) in 2009.}} {{MedalSport | Women's [[cross country skiing]]}} {{MedalGold | [[2006 Winter Olympics|2006 Turin]] | [[Cross-country skiing at the 2006 Winter Olympics|4 x 5 km]]}} {{MedalBronze | [[2006 Winter Olympics|2006 Turin]] | [[Cross-country skiing at the 2006 Winter Olympics|7.5 km + 7.5 km<br> double pursuit]]}} {{MedalWorldChampionships}} {{MedalSilver|[[FIS Nordic World Ski Championships 2005|2005 Oberstdorf]]|4 x 5 km}} {{MedalSilver|[[FIS Nordic World Ski Championships 2009|2009 Liberec]]|[[Cross-country skiing at the FIS Nordic World Ski Championships 2009|30 km]]}} {{MedalBottom}} '''Yevgeniya Vladimirovna Medvedeva''' ({{lang-ru|Евге́ния Влади́мировна Медве́дева-Арбу́зова}}; formerly '''Arbuzova''', born 4 July 1976 in [[Kondopoga]], [[Karelian ASSR]]) is a [[Russia]]n cross-country skier who has competed since 1996. Competing in two [[Winter Olympics]], she won two medals at [[Turin]] in [[2006 Winter Olympics|2006]] with a gold in the 4 x 5 km and a bronze in the 7.5 km + 7.5 km double pursuit. Medvedeva-Arbuzova also won two silver medals at the [[FIS Nordic World Ski Championships]] (30 km: [[FIS Nordic World Ski Championships 2009|2009]], 4 x 5 km: [[FIS Nordic World Ski Championships 2005|2005]]). ==References== * {{FIS|S=CC|ID=1593|name=Yevgeniya Medvedeva}} {{Footer Olympic Champions XC Relay Women}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Medvedeva-Arbuzova, Yevgeniya | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Cross-country skier | DATE OF BIRTH = 4 July 1976 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Medvedeva-Arbuzova, Yevgeniya}} [[Category:1976 births]] [[Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics]] [[Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2010 Winter Olympics]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Russia]] [[Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Russia]] [[Category:Olympic gold medalists for Russia]] [[Category:People from Kondopoga]] [[Category:Russian cross-country skiers]] [[Category:Olympic medalists in cross-country skiing]] [[Category:Female cross-country skiers]] [[Category:Russian sportswomen]] [[Category:FIS Nordic World Ski Championships medalists in cross-country skiing]] [[Category:Medalists at the 2006 Winter Olympics]] {{Russia-XC-skiing-bio-stub}}
